sqlQuery.name: SampleBySampleId
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct s.name as name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM ApidbTuning.SampleAttributes s, ($$sample_id$$) ds WHERE lower(s.name) = lower(ds.name)

sqlQuery.name: SampleByMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct s.name as name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM ApidbTuning.SampleAttributes s, APIDBTUNING.SAMPLEDOWNSTREAM sds WHERE sds.OUTPUT_PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID in ($$samples_filter_metadata$$) AND sds.OUTPUT_ISA_TYPE = 'Data' AND s.PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID = sds.PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID ORDER BY s.name

sqlQuery.name: SampleByTaxonAbundance
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct s.name as name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM ApidbTuning.SampleAttributes s, APIDBTUNING.SAMPLEDOWNSTREAM sds WHERE sds.OUTPUT_PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID in ($$samples_filter_taxon$$) AND sds.OUTPUT_ISA_TYPE = 'Data' AND s.PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID = sds.PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID ORDER BY s.name
